entry.string: Meta Block Help Information
The meta block is responsible for supplying metadata about your site.
entry.translation: Der Meta-Block ist verantwortlich für die Bereitstellug von Metadaten für Ihre Seite

entry.string: Meta tags are a way you can supply meta data about your site to browsers and to things like search engines.
entry.translation: Meta-Tags sind eine Möglichkeit, mit der Sie Metadaten über Ihre Seite für Browser oder Suchmaschinen bereitstellen können.

entry.string: The meta block comes with a limited set of meta tags enabled by default and allows you to add, change or remove them at any time, without ever having to edit your templates. It supports the following parameters.
entry.translation: Der Meta-Block kommt standardmäßig mit einer begrenzten Anzahl an Meta-Tags

entry.string: the type of tag, one of
name
or
http-equiv
, required
value
the value for this type of tag, eg author, description, generator, etc.., required
content
the meta data content for this meta type, required
the language code for the content, optional
entry.translation: der Sprachcode für den Inhalt, optional

entry.string: the text direction of the content, ltr or rtl, optional
the scheme used to interpret the content, optional
NOTE: if the content is empty, the tag will not be rendered.
The xar:meta tag
Xaraya supplies the xar:meta tag, which allows you to add content dynamically from within modules, for instance to supply a description and keywords based on the current content being displayed.
It accepts the same parameters as the tags in the meta block itself.
entry.translation: Es akzeptiert diesselben Parameter wie die Tags im Meta-Block auch.

entry.string: It also accepts an additional
append

parameter, which when present will append content to an existing tag if the tag already exists. This allows you to, for example, supply a standard set of keywords in the meta block, and then add keywords based on the current content.
The xar:place-meta tag
The xar:place-meta tag is responsible for rendering any tags supplied by the meta block, plus any tags supplied by xar:meta tags in templates.
entry.translation: Der xar:place-Meta-Tag ist verantwortlich für die Rendering jeglicher Tags des Metablocks und darüber hinaus
